job_description:
Title: Java Full Stack Developer
Location: Chicago, Illinois
 Employment Type: Contract 

E: gayathri@logiclineinnovation.com

Job Description
We are seeking a skilled Java Full Stack Developer to build and enhance scalable web applications using Angular/React, Java 17+, and Spring Boot 3+. The role involves full-stack development, API design, cloud deployment, and Agile collaboration.

Key Responsibilities
Develop end-to-end full stack applications using Angular 14‚Äì18/React + TypeScript and Java 17+, Spring Boot.
Build and maintain RESTful APIs, microservices, and secure integrations.
Write unit, integration, and frontend tests (JUnit, Mockito, Jasmine/Karma, Cypress).
Deploy and manage applications on AWS (GCP/Azure experience a plus).
Use Docker and Kubernetes (EKS/GKE) for containerization and orchestration.
Work in Agile/Scrum, participate in sprint ceremonies, and support production issues when required.
ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a concise email.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should
Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

Please format the email body with proper line breaks:
- One line break after the greeting
- Double line breaks between paragraphs
- One line break before the signature
- Use \n for line breaks

Example format:
Dear [Name],\n\n[Paragraph 1]\n\n[Paragraph 2]\n\nBest regards,\n[Your Name]

Example response:


I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_subject: Application for Java Full Stack Developer (Chicago, Illinois)
email_body:
Dear Hiring Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I am excited to express my interest in the Java Full Stack Developer position based in Chicago, Illinois. After reviewing the job description, I am confident that my extensive experience in full-stack development and relevant technologies align well with the requirements of the role.

Having worked on designing and developing scalable web applications using Angular, React, Java (8-17), and Spring Boot, I have a strong foundation in end-to-end full-stack development, API design, and cloud deployment. My experience also includes building microservices, writing tests for both backend and frontend, and deploying applications on cloud platforms like Azure and GCP.

I am particularly impressed by your team's focus on Agile collaboration and the use of Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration, areas where I have hands-on experience and a keen interest in further developing my skills.

I have attached my updated resume for your review and would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my background and skills can contribute to your team's success. Please let me know if there is any additional information needed from my end.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing the role further.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
ob Title: Full Stack Developer
 Location: Conshohocken, PA (On-site)
 Experience: 8+ Years
 Job Type: 6-Month Contract

Job Description

We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to join our client‚Äôs development team. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies with hands-on experience building scalable, high-performance web applications.

Key Responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain dynamic web applications using Angular and ReactJS.
Build robust backend services and APIs with Node.js, Java, and Spring Boot.
Manage and optimize PostgreSQL databases for scalability and performance.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deliver new features.
Ensure application performance, security, and scalability.
Conduct unit testing, debugging, and code reviews to ensure high-quality code.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues across the full stack.

Required Skills

Front-End: Angular, ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript
Back-End: Node.js, Java, Spring Boot
Database: PostgreSQL
Hands-on experience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Proficiency with version control systems (e.g., Git)
Strong problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills
Preferred Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and containerization tools (Docker, Kubernetes)
üì© To Apply: Please send your updated resume to john@fourhubtech.com

Dear Hiring Manager,

I hope this email finds you well. I am excited to express my interest in the Full Stack Developer position at your company in Conshohocken, PA. After reviewing the job description, I am confident that my 8+ years of experience align closely with the requirements of the role.

job_description:
#Hiring hashtag#Java full stack # developer hashtag#Remote hashtag#ctc hashtag#Python hashtag#AWS
Role:Java Fullstack Developer(AWS/NodeJS/Python)
Location:100% remote
Client:Southwest airlines
NO h1B

 
Core Stack & Architecture

‚Ä¢ Strong hands-on experience with AWS
Serverless stack:
‚Ä¢ AWS Lambda (Node.js/Python)
‚Ä¢ DynamoDB (single-table design, GSIs, Streams)
‚Ä¢ EventBridge (event-driven architectures)
‚Ä¢ Step Functions (workflow orchestration)
‚Ä¢ API Gateway & AppSync (GraphQL)
Programming Languages
‚Ä¢ Proficient in Node.js and Python
‚Ä¢ Able to write clean, modular, testable serverless functions
‚Ä¢ Experience writing integration and unit tests (Jest, Pylest, etc.)

Messaging & Streaming

‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of Apache Kafka
‚Ä¢ Event publishing/subscription patterns
‚Ä¢ Partitioning, retention, offset management
‚Ä¢ Integration with on-prem or cloud
connectors
Infrastructure & Monitoring
‚Ä¢ Experience deploying using CDK, Serverless
Framework, or Terraform
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of CloudWatch, X-Ray, log insights, and custom metrics
‚Ä¢ Proficient in creating alerts, dashboards, and structured logging

Mail: anju@openclouditsolutions.com

job_description:
Hello Guys,

Please go through the JD below and let me know if you are interested.

Job Title: Sr. Full Stack Developer
Location: Atlanta, GA (Hybrid)
F2F interview

We are looking for an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer to design, develop, and maintain scalable software solutions. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, RESTful APIs, Apigee, JBOSS, Oracle, and cloud platforms like AWS and OpenShift. Proficiency in Angular, HTML5, CSS3, TypeScript, and Bootstrap is essential. 

Responsibilities include enhancing on-premises and PAAS applications, migrating systems to AWS, designing serverless and containerized architectures, and building industry-standard APIs. You will drive performance improvements, ensure security compliance, and promote best practices such as TDD, BDD, CI/CD, and Agile methodologies. 

The role involves collaborating across teams, leading code reviews, supporting production systems, and participating in a 24/7 on-call rotation.

Skills required:

Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, RESTFul APIs, Apigee, JBOSS, Oracle for Amazon Cloud/OpenShift platform Angular , HTML5 , CSS3 , Type Script and Bootstrap AWS S3, EC2, RDS and Lamadas Restful API and Microservices API Knowledgeable in Java internals, JVM tuning and troubleshooting.

Send resumes to Arun@sdvstech.com

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

job_description:
Title: Java Fullstack Developer

Location: Remote

Duration: 6+ Months

Need only GC & USC

Rate: $50/hr on C2C

Job Description:

Looking for 10+ years experienced Full Stack developer to join us in the design and development of innovative technology for financial advisors and their clients using the latest technology stack in a collaborative and engaging environment.

You will play a leading role in the agile development of the web applications used by thousands of Registered Investment Advisors and Correspondents to deliver comprehensive brokerage solutions to their customers, including account management, trading, money movement, compliance, market research, portfolio management, and margin lending.

Our development teams are highly collaborative and encourage creativity, innovation, and excellence. Your experience, skills, and input will be critical to our shared success.

Advanced full stack software development experience, building enterprise web and middle tier applications using Angular and core Java with Spring/Springboot.

Experience working in an Agile Scrum development environment.

Experience in REST API development via gateway

Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and AWS cloud deployment/application management.

Experience with unit testing and test automation libraries/strategies.

Experience building and deploying applications using continuous integration pipelines and automated deployment tools such as Jenkins.

Experience using source control and pull requests for collaborative development in code repository tools such as GitHub.

Developing and deploying software in a fast-paced environment.
share profiles with work Authorization and current location to kumar@placifylr.com
